I came here for early brunch and again for early dinner.  Both times phenomenal food.  Love the cuttlefish, cod, razor clam and fried green pepper.  The key to beat the crowd was to go eat earlier than everybody else, meaning at 10:30am and 6:30am.   No wait at all.  All their seafood dishes were well prepared except for the fried anchovies which was a tad fishy.  Love this place as much as its sister restaurant just blocks down.
